abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, is talking to close relationship banks about refinancing $13 billion of loans, Reuters reported.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, is talking to close relationship banks about refinancing $13 billion of loans, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, is talking to close relationship banks about refinancing $13 billion of loans, Reuters reported, citing banking sources.

headline.main: ABInBev Said to Be in $13 Billion Refinance Talks
